name: bullet hell 1 hour project
description:
i made a game in an hour. it's a top down shooter kinda game...

enter - start.

wasd - movement.

left mouse - shoot.

mouse - aim your shoot.

made in gamemaker studio 2.

graphics in aseprite.

sfx in bfxr. reused from roguelike_mini.

font m3x6 by @managore.
